messages.title: WANT TO STOP LABOUR WINNING HERE?
messages.content: ONLY A LIBERAL DEMOCRAT VOTE CAN BEAT LABOUR HERE. Whatever happens nationally on 8th June, in your area only the Liberal Democrats and Labour can win. Voting Conservative risks letting Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party win in your area. More and more Conservative voters in places like this are switching to the Liberal Democrats this time. They know that's the only way to beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party here.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Whatever happens nationally on 8th June, in your area only the Liberal Democrats and Labour can win. Voting Conservative risks letting Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party win in your area. More and more Conservative voters in places like this are switching to the Liberal Democrats this time.

endorsements.endorsement: We're a mess under Corbyn, says [Labour] donor.
Right now Labour simply isn't up to the job.

images.caption: Depicted person appears to be reacting negatively or distressed related to quotes presented from media sources.
